oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nanomaterials for corrosion control
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SAJI, VS
THOMAS, J
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: corrosion
coating
nanomaterials
r&d
sol-gel coatings
particle coatings
behavior
protection
nickel
aa2024-t3
metals
alloy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Nanomaterials are important due to their unique properties that may lead to new and exciting applications. Current scenario of application of nanotechnology in the field of corrosion prevention of metals is reviewed here. Recent research and developments in this area are discussed in designing efficient coating materials and alloys, which provide superior resistance to corrosion.
